element.name: restriction
element.description: URL restriction.

element.name: protocol
element.description: Supported protocol.

element.name: special-value
element.description: The definition of a special (out of band) value.

element.name: description
element.description: An arbitrary description for the special value.

element.name: value
element.description: The special value (e.g. "missing")

element.name: value
element.description: Specified value for the attribute

attribute.name: as
attribute.description: Binding. Defaults to 'default'. Constants cannot be changed.

element.name: reference
element.description: Reference to another element or attribute. Specifies the relative or absolute path for an 'element' or a document name.

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: Alternate (display) name for the element.

attribute.name: label-plural
attribute.description: Alternate (display) name for plural form of the the element.

attribute.name: max-occurs
attribute.description: Defines the maximum number of occurences of the element. If not specified, defaults to infinity.

attribute.name: min-occurs
attribute.description: Defines minimum number of occurences of the element. If not specified, defaults to one.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name of the reference element.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: The type of reference. An element must occur within this definition.

element.name: description
element.description: Description of the element.

element.name: instructions
element.description: End user instructions for the element.

element.name: value
element.description: XPath to element within document or document name. The referent must exist at the time this reference is made.

element.name: description
element.description: An arbitrary description for the document.

element.name: dictionary-auto
element.description: For nodes where the data type will use a dictionary when indexed (e.g. strings), this is the default dictionary to use. Can be overridden for each node.

element.name: for
element.description: Which object type is the document relevant for. If the document type relates to collections then it can not also be used for assets. If the document type relates to assets then it can not also be used for collections. Defaults to 'asset'.

element.name: generated-by
element.description: Is this metadata generated by a (plugin) 'application', by a content 'analyzer' or by the 'user'. Defaults to 'user' generated.

element.name: index
element.description: Sets the default indexing for all nodes. If set to 'all', then all nodes will be indexed by default, unless there is an explicity 'index=false' for a particular node. If 'none' then no nodes will be indexed, unless there is an explicit 'index=true' for a given node. The default is 'index=none'.

element.name: instructions
element.description: Instructions for people filling in this document.

element.name: label
element.description: An alternate name (from type) for the document.

element.name: mimetype
element.description: A MIME type to associate with this document. The type may be a super-type. If not specified, associated with all types.

element.name: source-of-truth
element.description: This document type definition is a source of truth and will not be overwritten during any replication event or archive restoration. Overrides the source-of-truth argument in the document definition, if provided. Defaults to 'false'.

element.name: tag
element.description: An arbitrary tag for the document type. Types can be filtered by tags.

element.name: type
element.description: The document type.

service.name: asset.doc.type.create.from.xml
service.description: Creates a document type(s) from sample XML. If more than one sample set is provided, then types generated for all.

element.name: include-namespaces
element.description: If true, then the full element QName is with any namespace prefix. If false (the default) then element namespaces are removed.

element.name: include-root
element.description: If true, then the document starts at the root. If false (the default), then the root element contains one or more elements that will be used to create one or more document types.

element.name: namespace
element.description: The document namespace for the type. Defaults to global namespace.

service.name: asset.doc.type.describe
service.description: Gets full details of a document type definition. The latest, or a specific version may be returned.

element.name: for
element.description: Documents should be returned where they apply to the the selected objects. Defaults to any documents.

element.name: generated-by
element.description: If specified, then restrict documents to those that are generated by a particular actor.

element.name: idx
element.description: Absolute cursor position. If used, the cursor will be positioned starting at 'idx'.

element.name: language
element.description: Search for translations in these languages.

element.name: mimetype
element.description: Restrict the list to those documents for the given MIME type. Ignored if document 'type' specified.

element.name: namespace
element.description: The namespace of the definitions. If not specified, then describes documents in the global namespace only. To describe in all namespaces, specify namespace as '*'.

element.name: size
element.description: Number of results to return. Defaults to 100 for actions returning results.

element.name: tag
element.description: Restrict the list to those documents with the given type. Ignored if document 'type' specified.

element.name: template
element.description: A template to overlay on the document definition for a specific purpose. Templates should only be used when describing a single document type.

element.name: document
element.description: Existing values, if any, that should be feed into the template. For example, extracted from a populated asset.

element.name: value
element.description: The value of fragments of the definition defined by the template.

element.name: text
element.description: Restrict the list to those documents containing the given text. If multitple text, then they all must exist. Ignored if 'type' specified.

element.name: type
element.description: The document type. The type must include the document namespace, if any.

attribute.name: must-exist
attribute.description: Indicates whether or not the definition must exist. It is possible to attempt to describe a definition that does not exist, by specifying 'must-exist=false', in which case no definition will be returned if the type does not exist. Defaults to true.

attribute.name: version
attribute.description: The document version. If not supplied, returns latest version.

service.name: asset.doc.type.destroy
service.description: Destroys a document type, either completely or a specified version thereof.

element.name: force
element.description: A document type cannot be destroyed if any asset version has the document attached, unless force is set to true. Defaults to false.

element.name: type
element.description: The document type.

attribute.name: version
attribute.description: The document version. If not supplied, destroys all versions. A value of zero means the latest version.

service.name: asset.doc.type.exists
service.description: Returns true if the document (type) exists and false if not.

element.name: type
element.description: The document type.

service.name: asset.doc.type.index
service.description: Allows the indexing status of all nodes in a definition to be set at once. May set all nodes to indexed or not indexed.

element.name: index
element.description: Sets the indexing for all nodes. If set to 'all', then all nodes will be indexed. If 'none' then no nodes will be indexed.

element.name: type
element.description: The document type.

service.name: asset.doc.type.list
service.description: Returns a list of the available types of documents that can be attached to an asset.

element.name: for
element.description: Documents should be returned where they apply to the the selected objects. Defaults to any documents.

element.name: generated-by
element.description: If specified, then restrict documents to those that are generated by a particular actor.

element.name: idx
element.description: Absolute cursor position. If used, the cursor will be positioned starting at 'idx'.

element.name: mimetype
element.description: Restrict the list to those documents for the given MIME type.

element.name: namespace
element.description: The namespace of the definitions. If not specified, then lists types in the global namespace only. To list in all, specify the namespace as '*'.

element.name: size
element.description: Number of results to return. Defaults to 100 for actions returning results.

element.name: tag
element.description: Restrict the list to those documents with the given type.

element.name: text
element.description: Restrict the list to those documents containing the given text. If multitple text, then they all must exist.

service.name: asset.doc.type.mime.add
service.description: Associates the document with the specified MIME type(s). Once associates with given types, cannot be used with other MIME types.

element.name: mimetype
element.description: A MIME type to associate with this document. The type may be a super-type. If not specified, associated with all types.

element.name: type
element.description: The document type.

service.name: asset.doc.type.mime.list
service.description: Associates the document with the specified MIME type(s). Once associates with given types, cannot be used with other MIME types.

element.name: type
element.description: The document type.

service.name: asset.doc.type.mime.remove
service.description: Removes the association of the specified MIME type(s) with the document. If there are no explicit assocations, then the document is associated with all types.

element.name: mimetype
element.description: A MIME type to associate with this document. The type may be a super-type. If not specified, associated with all types.

element.name: type
element.description: The document type.

service.name: asset.doc.type.prune
service.description: Gets full details of a document type definition. The latest, or a specific version may be returned.

element.name: keep
element.description: The maximum number of versions to keep. Defaults to 5.

element.name: tag
element.description: Restrict the list to those documents with the given type. Ignored if document 'type' specified.

element.name: type
element.description: The document type.

service.name: asset.doc.type.script.create
service.description: Saves one or more document definitions in shell format to allow recreation. The latest, or a specific version may be returned.

element.name: include-tags
element.description: Should site specific document type tags be included in the generated script. Defaults to 'false'

element.name: mimetype
element.description: Restrict the list to those documents for the given MIME type. Ignored if document 'type' or 'prefix' specified.

element.name: namespace
element.description: A document namespace. If specified, a script will be created for all documents in this namespace.

element.name: prefix
element.description: Specifies the prefix of document types to add to the script. This argument will be ignored, if 'type' is specified.

element.name: tag
element.description: Restrict the list to those documents with the given type. Ignored if document 'type' specified.

element.name: type
element.description: The document type.

attribute.name: version
attribute.description: The document version. If not supplied, returns latest version.

service.name: asset.doc.type.tag.add
service.description: Tags the document with the specified label/tag. Document types can then be filtered by tags.

element.name: tag
element.description: An arbitrary tag for the document type. Types can be filtered by tags.

element.name: type
element.description: The document type.

service.name: asset.doc.type.tag.describe
service.description: Returns the list of tags on a document type

element.name: type
element.description: The document type.

service.name: asset.doc.type.tag.remove
service.description: Removes tags from a document type.

element.name: tag
element.description: An arbitrary tag for the document type. Types can be filtered by tags.

element.name: type
element.description: The document type.

service.name: asset.doc.type.tag.remove.all
service.description: Removes all tags from a document type.

element.name: type
element.description: The document type.

service.name: asset.doc.type.tag.set
service.description: Set the tags on a specific document typetag. Document types can then be filtered by tags.

element.name: tag
element.description: An arbitrary tag for the document type. Types can be filtered by tags.

element.name: type
element.description: The document type.

service.name: asset.doc.type.update
service.description: Creates a new version of an existing document type.

element.name: allow-incomplete
element.description: Determines whether or not this document definition is explicity allowed (or not) to be incomplete. If 'maybe' (the default), then policy is controlled by caller.

element.name: create
element.description: Specifies whether to create the definition if not found. Defaults to false.

element.name: definition
element.description: The definition of the document type.

element.name: element
element.description: Document element.

attribute.name: active
attribute.description: Set to false if the element is no longer in active use.

attribute.name: case-sensitive
attribute.description: For enumeration types, indicates whether case is important. Default is case insensitive.

attribute.name: comparable
attribute.description: Set to true if type is a string and it is intended to perform comparisons or sorting on that string. If not set, a string is tokenized during indexing (if set), but two values cannot be compared. The first 128 characters (at most) will be comparable.

attribute.name: default
attribute.description: Default value for the element.

attribute.name: dictionary
attribute.description: For strings, if set, requires the value(s) exist in the specified dictionary.

attribute.name: dictionary-auto
attribute.description: For strings, if set, uses this dictionary to store (automatically populated) values found in the string.

attribute.name: display-length
attribute.description: For strings, a suggested length for widgets. Typically defaults to 10 but is client dependent.

attribute.name: encrypt
attribute.description: Set to true if the element value should be stored in encrypted form. If not set, defaults to no encryption. Encrypted elements cannot be indexed.

attribute.name: enumerated-values
attribute.description: For enumeration types, is a comma separated list of valid values. Mandatory for enumeration types if 'dictionary' is not specified.

attribute.name: ignore-descendants
attribute.description: Should any arbitrary descendants of this node be ignored when validating? If 'true' then don't include sub-elements. Defaults to false.

attribute.name: index
attribute.description: Set to true if the element should be indexed for searching. If not set, defaults to no indexing.

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: Alternate (display) name for the element.

attribute.name: label-plural
attribute.description: Alternate (display) name for plural form of the the element.

attribute.name: length
attribute.description: For strings, is the maximum length of the string. If not specified, defaults to max. integer.

attribute.name: max
attribute.description: For numbers (integer or float) is the maximum value. If not specified, defaults to max. integer or float.

attribute.name: max-occurs
attribute.description: Defines the maximum number of occurences of the element. If not specified, defaults to infinity.

attribute.name: min
attribute.description: For numbers (integer or float) is the minimum value. If not specified, defaults to min. integer or float.

attribute.name: min-length
attribute.description: For strings, is the minimum length of the string. If not specified, defaults to 1.

attribute.name: min-occurs
attribute.description: Defines minimum number of occurences of the element. If not specified, defaults to one.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Name of the element.

attribute.name: password
attribute.description: If true, treat this string as a password (filter from logs etc.) Defaults to false.

attribute.name: pattern
attribute.description: For strings, defines a regular expression that the string must conform. If not specified, an arbitrary pattern is used, equivalent to: '[^]+?'.

attribute.name: recurse
attribute.description: Can this element be a sub-element of self? Defaults to false.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Data type of the value.

element.description: The maximum length of the string. By default unbounded.

element.name: min-length
element.description: The minimum length of the string. By default has a value of 1.

element.name: password
element.description: If true, treat this string as a password (filter from logs etc.) Defaults to false.

element.name: pattern
element.description: A regular expression with which the value must comply.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: An optional (human friendly) explanation or example of the pattern.

element.name: text
element.description: A string that is deemed to be 'text' is likely to contain words, and should be indexed as such. If not text, then not expected to contain words. Defaults to true.

element.name: restriction
element.description: URL restriction.

element.name: protocol
element.description: Supported protocol.

element.name: description
element.description: Description of the element.

element.name: instructions
element.description: End user instructions for populating this element.

element.name: reference
element.description: Reference to another element or attribute. Specifies the relative or absolute path for an 'element' or a document name.

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: Alternate (display) name for the element.

attribute.name: label-plural
attribute.description: Alternate (display) name for plural form of the the element.

attribute.name: max-occurs
attribute.description: Defines the maximum number of occurences of the element. If not specified, defaults to infinity.

attribute.name: min-occurs
attribute.description: Defines minimum number of occurences of the element. If not specified, defaults to one.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name of the reference element.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: The type of reference. An element must occur within this definition.

element.name: description
element.description: Description of the element.

element.name: instructions
element.description: End user instructions for the element.

element.name: value
element.description: XPath to element within document or document name. The referent must exist at the time this reference is made.

element.name: restriction
element.description: Boolean restriction.

element.name: false
element.description: Possible boolean value indicating true. Defaults to [0,no,false]

element.name: true
element.description: Possible boolean value indicating true. Defaults to [1,yes,true]

element.name: restriction
element.description: Constant restriction.

element.name: value
element.description: The value of the constant.

element.name: restriction
element.description: Date restriction.

element.name: human-age
element.description: If true, 2 digit years will converted to 4 digit years between now and (now-99years).

element.name: time
element.description: Should the date include time in the form HH:MM:SS/HH:MM. Defaults to true.

element.name: time-include-milliseconds
element.description: If including time, should it exclude the milliseconds part, i.e., in the form HH:MM:SS, or include milliseconds in the form HH:MM:SS.sss. Defaults to false.

element.name: time-include-seconds
element.description: If including time, should it exclude the seconds part, i.e., in the form HH:MM, or include seconds. Defaults to true.

element.name: time-zone-offset
element.description: The timezone to interpret date and time. If unspecified, defaults to the zone for the session or system.

element.name: restriction
element.description: Double precision point number restriction.

element.name: maximum
element.description: The maximum value. Defaults to infinity.

element.name: minimum
element.description: The minimum value. Defaults to -infinity.

element.name: symbol
element.description: A symbolic definition.

element.name: description
element.description: An arbitrary description for the symbol.

element.name: range
element.description: The symbol may represent a range of values

element.name: max
element.description: The maximum value

attribute.name: inc
attribute.description: Is value inclusive of the maximum. Defaults to true.

element.name: min
element.description: The minimum value

attribute.name: inc
attribute.description: Is value inclusive of the minimum. Defaults to true.

element.name: value
element.description: The value of the symbol.

element.name: restriction
element.description: Enumeration restriction.

element.name: case-sensitive
element.description: Indicates whether comparisons are case sensitive or not. Defaults to false.

element.name: dictionary
element.description: The name of a dictionary in which to resolve values.

element.name: service
element.description: The name of a service used to values.

element.name: value
element.description: A specified value.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: A description for the value

element.name: restriction
element.description: Floating point number restriction.

element.name: maximum
element.description: The maximum value. Defaults to infinity.

element.name: minimum
element.description: The minimum value. Defaults to -infinity.

element.name: restriction
element.description: String restriction.

element.name: max-length
element.description: The maximum length of the identifier. By default unbounded.

element.name: min-length
element.description: The minimum length of the identifier. By default has a value of 1.

element.name: restriction
element.description: Integer restriction.

element.name: maximum
element.description: The maximum value. Defaults to infinity.

element.name: minimum
element.description: The minimum value. Defaults to -infinity.

element.name: radix
element.description: The base/radix of the number. Defaults to 10.

element.name: restriction
element.description: Keyword restriction.

element.name: dictionary
element.description: The name of a dictionary in which to resolve values.

element.name: restriction

element.name: maximum
element.description: The maximum value. Defaults to infinity.

element.name: minimum
element.description: The minimum value. Defaults to -infinity.

element.name: radix
element.description: The base/radix of the number. Defaults to 10.

element.name: restriction
element.description: String restriction.

element.name: case
element.description: Forces the string to upper, lower or title case - not for validation, but for coersion. Use a pattern for validation.

element.name: dictionary

attribute.name: auto
attribute.description: If set to true, then this dictionary will be populated with indexed values. Defaults to false.

element.name: display-length
element.description: A suggested length for widgets. Typically defaults to 10 but is client dependent.

element.name: lines
element.description: The number of lines. A value greater than one indicates multi-line text. Defaults to 1. This is typically a hint for presentation.

element.name: max-length
element.description: The maximum length of the string. By default unbounded.

element.name: min-length
element.description: The minimum length of the string. By default has a value of 1.

element.name: password
element.description: If true, treat this string as a password (filter from logs etc.) Defaults to false.

element.name: pattern

attribute.name: description

element.name: restriction

element.name: case
element.description: Forces the string to upper, lower or title case - not for validation, but for coersion. Use a pattern for validation.

element.name: dictionary

attribute.name: auto

element.name: display-length

element.name: lines
